titles.title: FTC Reauthorization Act of 2005
A bill to reauthorize the Federal Trade Commission.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with amendments favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

bill.summary: 7/13/2005--Introduced. FTC Reauthorization Act of 2005 - Amends the Federal Trade Commission Act to authorize appropriations for the Federal Trade Commission for FY2006-FY2010.
